EmailTemplate.name: Networking Event Reminder
EmailTemplate.subject: Reminder: Network in New York City with MBO
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Associate}},
If you haven’t already registered for our upcoming New York City Networking Cocktail Reception, taking place on the evening of Thursday, June 6 at Zengo <http://www.richardsandoval.com/zengony/index.php>, please go ahead and reserve your spot today <http://events.r20.constantcontact.com/register/event?oeidk=a07e7ed57nn4e1443a1&llr=kp5x6qkab>. This will be an excellent opportunity for you to meet fellow Associates and Entrepreneurs, MBO Enterprise clients and several members of the MBO Partners team!
As an added bonus, connection agent and popular online author Steve Woodruff <http://www.stevewoodruff.com/> will be speaking about building a top-notch opportunity network, as well as leveraging social tools to strategically and creatively expand your business.
We’d love to see you, so register today <http://events.r20.constantcontact.com/register/event?oeidk=a07e7ed57nn4e1443a1&llr=kp5x6qkab>!
Sincerely, ___________________________________ {{company.BM FName:default=MBO}} {{company.BM LName:default=Partners}} Business Manager MBO Partners
